alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 26 at 8:16PM MST until November 28 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM SUNDAY TO 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...South Laramie Range and South Laramie Range Foothills. * WHEN...From 11 AM Sunday to 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL IMPACTS...Light snow tonight may create periods of blowing and drifting snow late Sunday and Sunday night as the winds increase. Visibility may be reduced to around 1 mile at times.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
